naslov: Stunning villa for sale in Zadar region - 240 m2 (prodaja)
opis: LOCATION: Interesting local activities are wine tours, botanical garden, water sports, bike rental, olive oil tours, hiking and a visit to the Vrana Lake Nature Park, which is recognizable by its Mediterranean climate, is one of the largest wetlands, and at the same time a refuge and winter resort for thousands of different species of birds. The town of Vrana is also known for the largest monument of Turkish architecture in Croatia, which is called Maškovića han. Namely, it was built in the 17th century and its construction was ordered by Jusuf Mašković, who was originally from Vrana and was an admiral of the Turkish fleet. Today this is a heritage hotel and restaurant near Zadar that is funded by the EU and the Ministry of Culture. The historic city of Zadar, known for the most beautiful sunset and the Sea Organ that left no one indifferent. Also, in Zadar there are plethora of historical monuments and social events that will delight anyone. ABOUT THE PROPERTY: Built in a contemporary style, modern villa is located 6 km from Pakostane. The newly built and luxury villa is 240 m2 in size, it has 4 comfortably furnished bedrooms that include 4 en suite bathrooms with showers. Three bedrooms are on the upper floor, while the fourth is on the ground floor. Fully air-conditioned villa is beautifully furnished with modern kitchen and dining room, spacious living room consisting of a corner set, coffee table and TV. Subterranean floor is furnished as a gym with all the neccessary equipment. On the ground terrace there is a 60 m2 pool, with a separate hydromassage section and section for children, next to which there are sun loungers where you can spend lazy afternoons. The terrace also offers an outside dining area as well as gas, wood and coal grill. Villa offers 3 parking spaces inside the yard, and the same number outside. AMENITIES: - Jacuzzi - Swimming pool - Outdoor grill - Private parking - Completely enclosed property - Gym - Large ground and first floor terraces - 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms - Living and reception area - Fully equipped kitchen - Children pool Contact for more info: Za više informacija zvati kontakt: Marijana Vladović Mob. : 091 9590 908 Email: marijana@eurohome-nekretnine.hr Web: www.eurohome-nekretnine.hr Agency fee is 2% + VAT for the buyer ID KOD AGENCIJE: 1639 Marijana Vladović Savjetnik u prodaji Mob: 091 9590 908 Tel: 01 6231 365 E-mail: marijana@eurohome-nekretnine.hr www.eurohome-nekretnine.hr
